other_tests.findings: No organisms on Gram stain and culture; acid-fast bacilli smear was negative; lactate dehydrogenase was raised at 29 Î¼kat/L; protein concentration suggested an exudate at 50 g/L; triglyceride measurement was substantially raised at 12.71 mmol/L.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The rate of fluid production diminished after 4 months, during which four aspirations were needed.

other_tests.findings: Resolution of the mediastinal lymphadenopathy and miliary nodules.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Lymph leakage stopped after successful anti-tuberculous therapy.
